Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.label: schematic background
Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.description: Draw a grey schematic background with grid and wall wireframe behind utility overlays.

Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.label: show power conduits
Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.description: Draw connected conduit path segments above the utilities dim.

Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.label: show power nets
Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.description: Color conduit cells by connected network grouping.

Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.label: show power users
Logistics_Grid.Framework.UtilityOverlayC.description: Draw occupied cells for CompPowerTrader buildings above the utilities dim.
